metadata.name: Indicator Measure
metadata.description: To specify how an indicator is being measured. This includes qualitative and quantitative values.

1.name: Unit
1.description: The indicator is measured in units.

2.name: Percentage
2.description: The indicator is measured in percentages

3.name: Nominal
3.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative nominal scale.

4.name: Ordinal
4.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative ordinal scale.
